page.title: 10WATERSPORT GOSFORTH/SEASCALE
page.content:
We were going on a boat outing to Wastwater.Wastwater is dangerous so we took our life jackets.I found out James was coming with us.I pleaded with my dad not to let him come,but he came.When we reached the island there were nests with eggs in.We hurried off the island rowing as fast as we could. We dropped my brother off and James and I went for a cruise.A big wave hit us.Both the oars were in the water.We had got one oar back so we skulled to shore.About half an hour later we had searched as far as we could.When we came back we found that a canoist had returned the other oar.
Most weekends my dad and I prepare to go on the sea with the canoes.You need to wear a spraydeck and life jacket. When we arrive at the beach we jump out.
